author: Rabiul
title: Hero Splendor Plus
description: Its superb fuel efficiency is another reason the Splendor Plus is so popular and boasts of decent levels of performance as well. Powering the Splendor Plus is a 97.2 cc air-cooled, four-stroke, single-cylinder engine rated at 8.36ps of peak power and 8.05 Ps of torque.

author: Rabiul
title: Hero Super Splendor
description: The Super Splendor is also known for its durability. Power comes from a 124.7 cc aircooled, 4- Stroke single cylinder engine delivering 9 bhp of peak power along with 10.35 Nm of torque. Another cool feature of the new Super Splendor is its idle start-stop system,

author: Rabiul
title: Honda CB350RS
description: Check out here the 3 Honda CB350RS colour images to decide which one suits you the best. CB350RS is available in colour options: & Athletic Blue Metallic. You can also download your favourite Honda CB350RS colour image.
